title: American Horror Story Weekly Wednesday Live Stream
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment: I’d really love to see a season based around a museum I think that would be super interesting!
Omg can you believe season 8 is gonna be the crossover season!!😱😱

Why is Ryan Murphy keeping the subtitle theme "hush-hush" like w/ Roanoke??  😲🤥😵😑 Ryan likes to play mind games w/ his fans.  He's a Scorpio after all.  Roanoke being a big "secret"... ?? 😏 He needs to spill the beans ASAP.
Sarah's never been the antagonist before...

What if the season is like Hollywood themed? Like the returning cast members being like the Loveboat, Evan being a hair dresser (maybe for behind the scenes), if Emma Roberts comes back maybe she will be Madison Montgomery again (even though she's dead). What you said was the 'hidden society' of Coven/Asylum could apply to that of actors whose careers were ruined.
